trans-unit.source: Isolates into a separate class methods that are used by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control and can be overridden by developers who extend the control, but are rarely needed by page developers.
trans-unit.target: Isola in una classe separata i metodi utilizzati dal <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> controllo e può essere sottoposto a override dagli sviluppatori che estendono il controllo, ma sono raramente richiesti dagli sviluppatori di pagine.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class is the largest class in the Web Parts control set.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>è la classe più grande nell'insieme di controlli Web part.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: It is also among the most important Web Parts classes because it is used on every Web page that contains Web Parts controls, and it coordinates and manages all Web Parts controls on a page.
trans-unit.target: È anche tra le classi più importanti di Web part perché viene utilizzato in ogni pagina Web che contiene i controlli Web part e consente di coordinare e gestione tutti i controlli Web part in una pagina.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class is used so frequently, and because it contains so many exposed methods, some methods needed mostly by control developers who are extending the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control are contained in the WebPartManagerInternals class.
trans-unit.target: Poiché la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>classe è utilizzata frequentemente, e perché contiene molti metodi esposti, alcuni metodi richiesti principalmente dagli sviluppatori di controlli che estende il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllo sono contenuti nella classe WebPartManagerInternals.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: This isolation of less-used methods into the WebPartManagerInternals class simplifies the API of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class, and the isolated methods do not appear on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> object in IntelliSense.
trans-unit.target: L'isolamento di metodi meno utilizzati nella classe WebPartManagerInternals semplifica l'API del <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>classe e i metodi isolati non vengono visualizzati nel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>oggetto in IntelliSense.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Developers who use the WebPartManagerInternals class are likely to have scenarios where they need to inherit from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control and customize it extensively.
trans-unit.target: Gli sviluppatori che utilizzano la classe WebPartManagerInternals sono spesso in cui devono ereditare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllare e personalizzare in modo esteso.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are building a Web portal application or a packaged set of Web Parts controls with custom display modes, custom zones, custom verbs, custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, and other extensions of the base Web Parts user interface (UI), in many cases (not all) you will need to override and extend some of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> members.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se si compila un'applicazione del portale Web o un set completo di controlli Web part con modalità di visualizzazione personalizzate, zone personalizzate, verbi personalizzati, custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlli e altre estensioni dell'interfaccia di base Web part utente (UI), in molti casi (non tutte) è necessario eseguire l'override ed estendono alcuni del <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>membri.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: And although the WebPartManagerInternals class is sealed so you cannot inherit from it, your custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class will likely need to call a number of the WebPartManagerInternals methods in order to manage Web Parts controls on a page.
trans-unit.target: E anche se la classe WebPartManagerInternals è sealed in modo non è possibile ereditare da esso personalizzato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>classe sarà probabilmente necessario chiamare un numero di metodi WebPartManagerInternals per gestire i controlli in una pagina Web part.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Like the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class, the WebPartManagerInternals class provides a server control that has no UI and is never visible on a page.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Come il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>(classe), la classe WebPartManagerInternals fornisce un controllo server che non dispone di alcuna interfaccia utente e non è mai visibile in una pagina.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Unlike <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>, the WebPartManagerInternals class is never declared in the markup of a page; it is strictly a worker object that performs background tasks.
trans-unit.target: A differenza di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>, nel markup della pagina non viene mai dichiarata la classe WebPartManagerInternals; è un oggetto di lavoro che esegue attività in background.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The typical way of using it is demonstrated by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class, which references it by means of the protected <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Internals%2A> property, and uses the referenced object to call the WebPartManagerInternals methods.
trans-unit.target: L'aspetto tipico di utilizzo viene dimostrata la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>classe, che fa riferimento a essa mediante il metodo protetto <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Internals%2A>proprietà e utilizza l'oggetto di riferimento per chiamare i metodi WebPartManagerInternals.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Internals%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The WebPartManagerInternals class contains only methods; there are no properties or events.
trans-unit.target: La classe WebPartManagerInternals contiene solo i metodi. non esistono proprietà o eventi.

trans-unit.source: All the methods in the class involve managing <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, or connections between controls.
trans-unit.target: Tutti i metodi nella classe implicano la gestione <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlli o le connessioni tra i controlli.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: To handle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, WebPartManagerInternals includes methods for adding them (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.AddWebPart%2A>), removing them <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.RemoveWebPart%2A>), handling events <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.CallOnDeleting%2A>), getting or setting details about their relationship to their zone (for example, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.GetZoneID%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetZoneIndex%2A>), or setting basic <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control properties (for example, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsClosed%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetHasSharedData%2A>).
trans-unit.target: Per gestire <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlli, WebPartManagerInternals include metodi per l'aggiunta (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.AddWebPart%2A>), rimuoverle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.RemoveWebPart%2A>), gestione degli eventi <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.CallOnDeleting%2A>), ottenere o impostare i dettagli sulla relazione per la zona (ad esempio, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.GetZoneID%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetZoneIndex%2A>), o l'impostazione di base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>le proprietà del controllo (ad esempio, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsClosed%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetHasSharedData%2A>).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetHasSharedData%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsClosed%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetZoneIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.GetZoneID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.CallOnDeleting%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.RemoveWebPart%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.AddWebPart%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: To handle connections, WebPartManagerInternals includes methods for deleting them (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.DeleteConnection%2A>), setting which transformer object to use (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetTransformer%2A>), setting whether a connection is shared and whether it is static (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsShared%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection%2CSystem.Boolean%29> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsStatic%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection%2CSystem.Boolean%29>), and setting a connection error message to use (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetConnectErrorMessage%2A>).
trans-unit.target: Per gestire le connessioni, WebPartManagerInternals include metodi per eliminarle (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.DeleteConnection%2A>), impostare l'oggetto trasformatore da utilizzare (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetTransformer%2A>), l'impostazione indica se una connessione condivisa e se è statico (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsShared%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection%2CSystem.Boolean%29> e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsStatic%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection%2CSystem.Boolean%29>) e l'impostazione di un messaggio di errore di connessione da utilizzare (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetConnectErrorMessage%2A>).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetConnectErrorMessage%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsStatic%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection%2CSystem.Boolean%29> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsShared%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection%2CSystem.Boolean%29> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetTransformer%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.DeleteConnection%2A>

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> or server control to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control's collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> o controllo del server di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> raccolta del controllo di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlli in una pagina Web.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> being added to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control's collection of controls.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> l'aggiunta di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> insieme di controlli del controllo.

trans-unit.source: Calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnClosing*> method of the specified control.
trans-unit.target: Chiamate di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnClosing*>metodo del controllo specificato.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnClosing*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> that has been selected for closing.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> che è stato selezionato per la chiusura.

trans-unit.source: Calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnConnectModeChanged*> method of the specified control.
trans-unit.target: Chiamate di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnConnectModeChanged*>metodo del controllo specificato.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnConnectModeChanged*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> that has entered or exited the connect display mode.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> che è entrato o uscito dalla modalità di connessione.

trans-unit.source: Calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnDeleting*> method of the specified control.
trans-unit.target: Chiamate di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnDeleting*>metodo del controllo specificato.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnDeleting*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> that has been selected for deletion.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> che è stato selezionato per l'eliminazione.

trans-unit.source: Calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnEditModeChanged*> method of the specified control.
trans-unit.target: Chiamate di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnEditModeChanged*>metodo del controllo specificato.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnEditModeChanged*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> that has entered or exited edit display mode.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> che è entrato o uscito dalla modalità di modifica.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> object has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: Indica se l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> oggetto è stato eliminato.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> that has been selected for deletion.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> che è stato selezionato per l'eliminazione.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether the connection has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: Valore booleano che indica se la connessione è stata eliminata.

trans-unit.source: Creates an object based on the parameter passed to the method.
trans-unit.target: Crea un oggetto in base al parametro passato al metodo.

trans-unit.source: The method uses the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeGenerator> class to create the type, an alternative that offers better performance than using the <xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo utilizza il <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeGenerator>classe per creare il tipo, un'alternativa che offre prestazioni migliori rispetto all'utilizzo di <xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%2A>(metodo).</xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%2A> </xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeGenerator>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the object to create.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Type>dell'oggetto da creare.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: An of the same type as type.
trans-unit.target: Un dello stesso tipo type .

trans-unit.source: Sets a property to indicate that the specified connection object has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: Imposta una proprietà per indicare che l'oggetto connessione specificato è stato eliminato.

trans-unit.source: The DeleteConnection method is one step in the process of terminating an existing connection between two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or other server controls on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo DeleteConnection è un passaggio del processo di chiusura di una connessione esistente tra due <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>o altri controlli server in una pagina Web.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: It sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.ConnectionDeleted%2A> property value to `true` to indicate that `connection` is deleted.
trans-unit.target: Imposta il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.ConnectionDeleted%2A>valore della proprietà da `true` per indicare che `connection` viene eliminato.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.ConnectionDeleted%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> that has been selected for deletion.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> che è stato selezionato per l'eliminazione.

trans-unit.source: Gets the ID of a zone that contains the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> or server control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'ID di una zona che contiene l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> o control server.

trans-unit.source: The GetZoneID method returns the ID of the zone that contains the control referenced by the `webPart` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo GetZoneID restituisce l'ID dell'area che contiene il controllo a cui fa riferimento il `webPart` parametro.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A> property of `webPart` references the actual zone object that contains `webPart`, not the ID of the zone.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A>proprietà di `webPart` fa riferimento all'oggetto effettivo zona contenente `webPart`, non l'ID della zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A>

trans-unit.source: If `webPart` is currently closed, the value of its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A> property is `null`, and the GetZoneID method will return the ID of the last zone that `webPart` was in prior to being closed.
trans-unit.target: Se `webPart` è chiuso, il valore della relativa <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A>proprietà `null`, e il metodo GetZoneID restituirà l'ID dell'ultimo zona che `webPart` trovava prima della chiusura.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> that resides in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> che si trova in una zona.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the ID of the zone that contains webPart.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che rappresenta l'ID dell'area che contiene webPart .

trans-unit.source: Loads previously saved state data for a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"></xref> object that participates in a connection between controls.
trans-unit.target: Carica salvato in precedenza dati sullo stato per un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"> </xref> oggetto che fa parte di una connessione tra i controlli.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"></xref> that is used to connect controls.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"> </xref> utilizzato per connettere i controlli.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that contains the previously saved state data.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Object>che contiene i dati di stato salvato in precedenza.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Removes a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> or other server control from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control's collection of controls.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> o un altro server di controllo dal <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> insieme di controlli del controllo.

trans-unit.source: Removes `webPart` from the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control's collection of Web Parts controls that it maintains for the page.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove `webPart` dall'oggetto corrente <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>insieme di controlli Web part che gestisce per la pagina del controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> or other server control to be removed.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> o un altro controllo server da rimuovere.

trans-unit.source: Saves state data for a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"></xref> object that participates in a connection between controls.
trans-unit.target: Salva dati sullo stato per un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"> </xref> oggetto che fa parte di una connessione tra i controlli.

trans-unit.source: The SaveConfigurationState method saves configuration data that is created when a user configures a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> control on a Web page as part of a connection between controls.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo SaveConfigurationState Salva i dati di configurazione che viene creati quando un utente configura un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>controllo in una pagina Web come parte di una connessione tra i controlli.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>

trans-unit.source: This configuration data is then reloaded each time the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> control is rendered, by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.LoadConfigurationState%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Questi dati di configurazione vengono ricaricati ogni volta che il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>rendering del controllo, tramite il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.LoadConfigurationState%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.LoadConfigurationState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"></xref> that is used to connect controls.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"> </xref> utilizzato per connettere i controlli.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that contains the saved state data.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Object>che contiene i dati di stato salvato.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Establishes an errors message, and causes the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome"></xref> object that is responsible for rendering a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control to render that message rather than the contents of the control.
trans-unit.target: Determina un messaggio di errori e il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome"> </xref> oggetto responsabile per il rendering un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controllo per il rendering di tale messaggio, anziché il contenuto del controllo.

trans-unit.source: The SetConnectErrorMessage method allows you to associate an error message with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control that participates in connections.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo SetConnectErrorMessage consente di associare un messaggio di errore con un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo che partecipa a connessioni.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: If an error occurs when another control is forming a connection with the control referenced by the `webPart` parameter, then after the connection process has failed, the error message is displayed in the user interface (UI), rather than the contents of `webPart`.
trans-unit.target: Se si verifica un errore quando un altro controllo Crea una connessione con il controllo a cui fa riferimento il `webPart` parametro dopo il processo di connessione non riuscito, il messaggio di errore viene visualizzato nell'interfaccia utente (UI), anziché il contenuto di `webPart`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome> object associated with `webPart` renders the error message in its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.RenderPartContents%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome>oggetto associato `webPart` esegue il rendering di messaggio di errore nella relativa <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.RenderPartContents%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.RenderPartContents%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> that participates in a connection with another control.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> che fa parte di una connessione con un altro controllo.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the text of the error message.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che contiene il testo del messaggio di errore.

trans-unit.source: Sets a property on a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> or other server control indicating whether the control has shared personalization data.
trans-unit.target: Imposta una proprietà in un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> o un altro server di controllo che indica se il controllo ha condiviso i dati di personalizzazione.

trans-unit.source: The SetHasSharedData method indicates whether `webPart` has shared personalization data.
trans-unit.target: Indica il metodo SetHasSharedData se `webPart` ha condiviso i dati di personalizzazione.

trans-unit.source: The value of the `hasSharedData` parameter that is passed into the method is assigned to the `webPart` control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HasSharedData%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di `hasSharedData` parametro passato nel metodo viene assegnato al `webPart` del controllo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HasSharedData%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HasSharedData%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> or other server control that can have shared personalization data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> o un altro controllo server condividere i dati di personalizzazione.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether `webPart` has shared data.
trans-unit.target: Un valore booleano che indica se `webPart` sono disponibili dati condivisi.

trans-unit.source: Sets a property on a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> or other server control indicating whether the control has user personalization data.
trans-unit.target: Imposta una proprietà in un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> o un altro server di controllo che indica se il controllo dispone di dati di personalizzazione utente.

trans-unit.source: The SetHasUserData method indicates whether `webPart` has individual user personalization data, as opposed to shared data.
trans-unit.target: Indica il metodo SetHasUserData se `webPart` sono dati di personalizzazione di singolo utente, a differenza dei dati condivisa.

trans-unit.source: The method assigns the value of the `hasUserData` parameter to the `webPart` control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HasUserData%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo assegna il valore del `hasUserData` parametro per il `webPart` del controllo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HasUserData%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HasUserData%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> or other server control that can have user personalization data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> o un altro controllo server che può avere i dati di personalizzazione utente.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether `webPart` has shared data.
trans-unit.target: Un valore booleano che indica se `webPart` sono disponibili dati condivisi.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsClosed*> property of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Imposta il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsClosed*>proprietà di un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsClosed*>

trans-unit.source: The SetIsClosed method sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsClosed%2A> property of `webPart`.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo imposta SetIsClosed il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsClosed%2A>proprietà `webPart`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsClosed%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method does not actually close `webPart`; it only sets the property that indicates whether `webPart` is closed.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo non viene effettivamente chiusa `webPart`; imposta solo la proprietà che indica se `webPart` viene chiuso.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> for which this method sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsClosed*> property.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> per cui questo metodo imposta la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsClosed*>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsClosed*>

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> is closed on a page.
trans-unit.target: Un valore booleano che indica se un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> viene chiuso in una pagina.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared*> property of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Imposta il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared*>proprietà di un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared*>

trans-unit.source: The SetIsShared method does not actually cause the control referenced by the `webPart` parameter to be shared; it only sets the property that indicates whether `webPart` is currently shared.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo SetIsShared non implica il controllo a cui fa riferimento il `webPart` parametro da condividere; imposta solo la proprietà che indica se `webPart` è attualmente condivisa.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> for which this method sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared*> property.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> per cui questo metodo imposta la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared*>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared*>

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether `webPart` is shared.
trans-unit.target: Un valore booleano che indica se `webPart` è condivisa.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsShared*> property of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Imposta il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsShared*>proprietà di un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> oggetto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsShared*>

trans-unit.source: The SetIsShared method does not actually cause the control referenced by the `connection` parameter to be shared; it only sets the property that indicates whether `connection` is currently shared.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo SetIsShared non implica il controllo a cui fa riferimento il `connection` parametro da condividere; imposta solo la proprietà che indica se `connection` è attualmente condivisa.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> between two <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> tra due <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlli.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether `connection` is shared.
trans-unit.target: Un valore booleano che indica se `connection` è condivisa.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStandalone*> property of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Imposta il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStandalone*>proprietà di un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStandalone*>

trans-unit.source: The SetIsStandalone method sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStandalone%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo imposta SetIsStandalone il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStandalone%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStandalone%2A>

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true` on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, it means that the control is not contained within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone.
trans-unit.target: Quando questa proprietà è impostata su `true` su un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>(controllo), significa che il controllo non è contenuto all'interno di un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>fuso.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> for which this method sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStandalone*> property.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> per cui questo metodo imposta la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStandalone*>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStandalone*>

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether `webPart` is a standalone control.
trans-unit.target: Un valore booleano che indica se `webPart` è un controllo autonomo.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStatic*> property of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Imposta il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStatic*>proprietà di un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStatic*>

trans-unit.source: The SetIsStatic method is used to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStatic%2A> property value of the control referenced by the `webPart` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo SetIsStatic viene utilizzato per impostare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStatic%2A>valore della proprietà del controllo a cui fa riferimento il `webPart` parametro.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStatic%2A>

trans-unit.source: If `webPart` is declared within a zone in the markup of a Web page, this method sets the property value to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se `webPart` dichiarata all'interno di una zona nel markup della pagina Web, questo metodo imposta il valore della proprietà per `true`.

trans-unit.source: If `webPart` is added to a page programmatically, or by a user through the Web Parts user interface (UI), then this method sets the property value to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se `webPart` viene aggiunto a una pagina a livello di codice oppure da un utente tramite l'interfaccia utente Web part (UI), questo metodo imposta il valore della proprietà su `false`.

trans-unit.source: The control for which the property value is being set.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo per cui viene impostato il valore della proprietà.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether `webPart` is static.
trans-unit.target: Un valore booleano che indica se `webPart` è statico.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsStatic*> property of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Imposta il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsStatic*>proprietà di un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> oggetto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsStatic*>

trans-unit.source: The SetIsStatic method is used to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsStatic%2A> property value of the connection referenced by the `connection` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo SetIsStatic viene utilizzato per impostare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsStatic%2A>valore della proprietà della connessione a cui fa riferimento il `connection` parametro.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsStatic%2A>

trans-unit.source: If `connection` is declared in the markup of a Web page, this method sets the property value to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se `connection` è dichiarato nel markup della pagina Web, questo metodo imposta il valore della proprietà per `true`.

trans-unit.source: If `connection` is added to a page programmatically, or by a user through the Web Parts user interface (UI), then this method sets the property value to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se `connection` viene aggiunto a una pagina a livello di codice oppure da un utente tramite l'interfaccia utente Web part (UI), questo metodo imposta il valore della proprietà su `false`.

trans-unit.source: The connection for which the property value is being set.
trans-unit.target: La connessione per cui viene impostato il valore della proprietà.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether `connection` is static.
trans-unit.target: Un valore booleano che indica se `connection` è statico.

trans-unit.source: Assigns a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"></xref> object to be used in a connection between two server controls.
trans-unit.target: Assegna un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"> </xref> oggetto da utilizzare in una connessione tra due controlli server.

trans-unit.source: When a connection between two server controls requires a transformer so that the consumer control can interpret data from the provider control, the SetTransformer method is called to supply a specific <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object.
trans-unit.target: Quando una connessione tra due controlli server richiede un trasformatore in modo che il controllo consumer può interpretare i dati dal controllo provider, il metodo SetTransformer viene chiamato per fornire una specifica <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>dell'oggetto per il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>oggetto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>

trans-unit.source: If the connection already has a transformer assigned to it, the object referenced by the `transformer` parameter overrides the existing one; otherwise, the object referenced in the `transformer` parameter is used.
trans-unit.target: Se la connessione è già assegnato un trasformatore ad esso, l'oggetto a cui fa riferimento il `transformer` parametro sostituisce quella esistente; in caso contrario, l'oggetto a cui fa riferimento il `transformer` parametro viene utilizzato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control uses the SetTransformer method whenever you call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A> method to establish a connection that requires a transformer.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllo Usa il metodo SetTransformer quando si chiama il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A>metodo per stabilire una connessione che richiede un trasformatore.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> that creates a connection between server controls.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> che crea una connessione tra i controlli server.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"></xref> to be used with `connection`.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer"> </xref> da utilizzare con `connection`.

trans-unit.source: Sets a property that enables a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> or server control to keep the ID of the containing zone.
trans-unit.target: Imposta una proprietà che consente un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> o server di controllo per mantenere l'ID della zona che contiene.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is being added to a zone.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato dal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllare quando un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo viene aggiunto a una zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control tracks the ID for the zone it belongs to, and this method sets the property that keeps the ID value.
trans-unit.target: Ogni <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo tiene traccia dell'ID per l'area a cui appartiene, e questo metodo imposta la proprietà che mantiene il valore ID.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> whose `zoneID` property value is being set.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> cui `zoneID` viene impostato il valore di proprietà.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the ID of the zone that `webPart` belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che contiene l'ID della zona che `webPart` appartiene.

trans-unit.source: Sets the index of the specified control within its zone relative to the other <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls within the zone.
trans-unit.target: Imposta l'indice del controllo specificato all'interno dell'area rispetto alle altre <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controlli all'interno della zona.

trans-unit.source: The SetZoneIndex method determines the ordinal position that `webPart` occupies in its zone, relative to other server controls in the zone.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo SetZoneIndex determina il numero ordinale di posizione che `webPart` occupa nella relativa zona, relazione ad altri controlli server nella zona.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control for which the method sets a zone index.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controllo per il quale il metodo imposta un valore di indice area.

trans-unit.source: The index of `webPart` within its zone relative to other controls in the zone.
trans-unit.target: L'indice di `webPart` all'interno dell'area in relazione ad altri controlli nella zona.
